00013 namespace mlpack {
00014 namespace distribution  {
00015 
00038 class DiscreteDistribution
00039 {
00040  public:
00044   DiscreteDistribution() { /* nothing to do */ }
00045 
00054   DiscreteDistribution(const size_t numObservations) :
00055       probabilities(arma::ones<arma::vec>(numObservations) / numObservations)
00056   { /* nothing to do */ }
00057 
00064   DiscreteDistribution(const arma::vec& probabilities)
00065   {
00066     // We must be sure that our distribution is normalized.
00067     double sum = accu(probabilities);
00068     if (sum > 0)
00069       this->probabilities = probabilities / sum;
00070     else
00071     {
00072       this->probabilities.set_size(probabilities.n_elem);
00073       this->probabilities.fill(1 / probabilities.n_elem);
00074     }
00075   }
00076 
00080   size_t Dimensionality() const { return 1; }
00081 
00090   double Probability(const arma::vec& observation) const
00091   {
00092     // Adding 0.5 helps ensure that we cast the floating point to a size_t
00093     // correctly.
00094     return probabilities((size_t) (observation[0] + 0.5));
00095   }
00096 
00104   arma::vec Random() const;
00105 
00113   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations);
00114 
00124   void Estimate(const arma::mat& observations,
00125                 const arma::vec& probabilities);
00126 
00128   const arma::vec& Probabilities() const { return probabilities; }
00130   arma::vec& Probabilities() { return probabilities; }
00131 
00132  private:
00133   arma::vec probabilities;
00134 };
00135
